English.Char_Desc_80: Pascal utilities units for several compilers (source code)
English.Char_Desc_250: Source code of pascal units for porting code across different pascal compilers. Currently supports, Virtual Pascal, Delphi, Free Pascal and Turbo Pascal. Also includes some useful string handling routines and Unicode support. Fully portable code.
English.Char_Desc_450: Source code of pascal units for porting code across different pascal compilers. Currently supports, Virtual Pascal, Delphi, Free Pascal and Turbo Pascal. Also includes some useful string handling routines, Unicode support, ISO 3601, ISO 639 and ISO 8601 based utility routines. Fully portable code.
